title: "An unknown DirectX error has occurred and League of Legends cannot start."
body:
So this happened to me when I went in a ranked game and now I lost LP for doing absolutely nothing.
How can I prevent this from happening again?

replies.body: Hey, sorry to hear about the LP loss here but I'm glad you reached out for some help.  This could be a combination of reasons, like a security setting preventing files from being used properly, or even bad settings/drivers.  Mae sure your OS is up to date, and try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league has access to be read properly.  Test it in a custom game and let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=TheWildestBoy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uMAUqWaV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-05T23:46:30.330+0000)
>
> This didnt do anything

Would love an answer to this as i have the same issue. I just bought an RX 580 and uninstalled drivers n freshly installed new one. League worked  no problem before. Same AMD Radeon software drivers....... Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks.
